NAME: Sargam Palod
ABOUT:
As a firm believer in the fact that we are heading in a direction where finance and economy are used synonymously creating unprecedented possibilities, I have always been involved in activities that lie in the intersection of both the segments. Equipped with a Master’s degree in Finance from one of the Institutes of Eminence (IoE) in India, along with CS (Executive) and CA (Intermediate), I’ve had fulfilling internships in the field of Corporate Finance with my side hustles in TEDx, Toastmasters, and the United Nations. Additionally, I’ve dabbled with machine learning, market research, volunteering, academic mentoring and leading teams.

During my term at the University of Warwick (England) as an Exchange Student, I discovered my passion in the arena of Data Science and Business Intelligence. Furthermore, I'm grateful to have been selected for my second international exchange term with Peking University in China. As a graduate student from Shiv Nadar University, I want to leverage the synergy between my finance and management backgrounds to drive change, identify new market opportunities, and be amidst the remodeling of the industry.

Keen on learning new skills, I've gradually developed a global mindset and tried to hone a broad spectrum of technical competencies such as Anaconda (Python), SAS, RStudio, SPSS, Tableau, Power BI, Azure ML and Advanced Excel. Outside of work, I love reading, traveling, and finding the perfect gift.
